titleStmt.title: The meanes of preventing, and preserving from, and curing of the most contagious disease, called the plague with the pestilential feaver, and the fearfull symptomes, and accidents, incident thereunto. Also some prayers, and meditations upon death.
titleStmt.author: M. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Million, at the Half Moon in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: "The epistle to the reader" is signed: M.R.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Half Moon in the Old Bayley
